contentrichtext.text: '''Ammihud''' - people of glory; i.e., "renowned." * The father of the Ephraimite chief Elishama, at the time of the [[The Exodus|Exodus]] ([[Book of Numbers]] 1:10; 2:18; 7:48, 53). * Num. 34:20. * Num. 34:28. * The father of [[List of minor Biblical figures#Pedahel|Pedahel]], a prince of the [[Tribe of Naphtali]]. (Num. 34:28) * The father of Talmai, king of Geshur, to whom [[Absalom]] fled after the murder of [[Amnon]] ([[2 Samuel]] 13:37). * The son of Omri, and the father of Uthai ([[1 Chronicles]] 9:4). {{eastons}} [[Category:Hebrew Bible people]] [[Category:Torah people]] {{Tanakh-stub}}
